metadata: The image shows a modern living room with a high ceiling and a ceiling fan. The walls are painted in a light beige color and the floor is made of hardwood. On the left side of the room, there is a large window with white shutters and a gray sofa with colorful throw pillows. Next to the sofa, there are two side tables with lamps and a small side table with a vase of flowers. In front of the sofa is a green armchair with a curved backrest and armrests. The room is decorated with a large abstract painting hanging on the wall on the right side. The floor is covered with a beige area rug with a geometric pattern.

This image is of a modern kitchen with a large island in the center. The island has a granite countertop with a blue and white patterned bowl on it. There are six blue barstools around the island, providing seating for six people. The kitchen has white cabinets and stainless steel appliances, including a refrigerator, oven, and range hood. The backsplash is made of white subway tiles, and there is a large window above the sink. The floor is made up of light-colored wood planks. The walls are painted in a light blue color, and the ceiling has recessed lighting. There is a door on the right side of the image, leading to another room.
